title: Lalpa sum ka ngainep a
lyrics:
Lalpa sum ka ngainep a,
Rangkachak tangka nen;
Vanram chu ka thlang zawk e,
A chhunga ka luh nan,
I vanram lehkhabua
A phek ropuiah chuan,
Ka Chhandamtu, min hrilh la,
Ka hming a chuang tawh em?

Ka hming a chuang tawh em,
A phek ropuiah chuan?
I vanram lehkhabuah,
Ka hming a chuang tawh em?

Lalpa, ka sual a tam a,
Luipuia tiau zatin!
Chhandamtu, i thisen hi
A tawk e, sil fai nan
I thutiam ziak a ni a,
Lehkha ropuitein,
"I sual bawlhhlawh mah sela,
Ka tifai ang," a ti.

Aw, chu khawpui mawiah chuan,
In eng ropui a awm;
Chhandam mite thlarau chuan,
Puan var ropui an sin;
Sualna a reh tawh ang a,
Thatna tichhetu chu;
Angel ven khawpuiah khian,
Ka hming a chuang tawh em?
